reviews.review:
Однако, мне эта игра до сих пор не надоела и иногда захожу в неё поиграть.
Лень писать плюсы и минусы, потому что у каждого они будут свои в этой игре.
好，但是没有bot，只能搞点骚操作了

The first ever PC shooter that I have gotten my hands on back in 2007. I am so glad since that year to be playing Counter Strike. CS 1.6 is honestly the start of it all to CSS and of course the most popular CS of all time being CS:GO. I recommend trying this game if you have never because this CS is one of my most favorite.
pasaran los años pero este juego sigue siendo una leyenda para muchos. (2 palabras que definen este juego nostalgia e infancia)
buen juego nostalgia lastima que ya no haya tantos servers
Jogo muito bom, Um classico realmente... Toda a serie da valve prevalecera!!!
O melhor FPS de todos os tempos. HISTÓRICO!
yes good I play a lot and cool skin very good
sehr gute ist beste ich liebe diese spiele <3
desde 2002... e o jogo não morre nunca...
One of the best of all time classics of CS
тупа для олдов,можо пуслушать школьников с читами и мужиков с завода
Un joc vechi dar foarte jucat!
Muito bom o jogo!! e faz uma nostalgia isso. Eu recomendo!!
Very Good game i would recommend
ja foi bom so hack hoje em dia
женя крылов приходи с армии ждем васем селом шушары!
CS 1.6 , N Tem o que reclamar dessa Beleza de Game . Ainda e muito LOTADO nos dias de hoje . Tu ficaaaa caralhooooooo que Nostalgiaaaa KKK , N Tem oque falar , só comprem e se Divirtaaaaa.
legendary game, used to play it alot back when i was really yong and still launch it sometimes
